blocks.name: csrg
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all semirings.
blocks.origin: const class csrg { SRing }

blocks.name: diff.csrg.s
diff.csrg.c
diff.csrg.w
df-srg
blocks.content: Define class of all semirings. A semiring is a set equipped with two everywhere-defined internal operations, whose first one is an additive commutative monoid structure and the second one is a multiplicative monoid structure, and where multiplication is (left- and right-) distributive over addition. Compared to the definition of a ring, this definition also adds that the additive identity is an absorbing element of the multiplicative law, as this cannot be deduced from distributivity alone. Definition of [Golan] p. 1. Note that our semirings are unital. Such semirings are sometimes called "rigs", being "rings without negatives". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: srgpcomp
blocks.content: If two elements of a semiring commute, they also commute if one of the elements is raised to a higher power. (Contributed by AV, 23-Aug-2019.)

  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2))))

blocks.name: srgpcompp
blocks.content: If two elements of a semiring commute, they also commute if the elements are raised to a higher power. (Contributed by AV, 23-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm srgpcompp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), c3, c2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cmgp, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, csrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c3, c5), co(c5, c3, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), c3, c2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(co(c4, c1, c5), c3, c2)), co(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), w0)

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2[c3]c4)))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))[c3]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(× ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ SRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[finSupp]c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2[c3]c4)))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))[c3]c4)), c7 =(+ ` c0))
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, (c2[c3]c4), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))[c3]c4), c5, c0, c6, c8, (hs0[c3]c4), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c0 ∈ SRing)
  srgcmn(c0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ SRing)
  srgmnd(c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(hs0[c3]c4))∈(c0[MndHom]c0), c0 ∈ SRing, c4 ∈ c5)
  srgrmhm(hs0, c0, c4, c5, c3)
  oveq1(hs0, c2, c3, c4)
  oveq1(hs0, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), c3, c4)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c3, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm sgsummulcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c4), cfsupp, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))))), wceq(c7, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))), c5, c0, c6, c8, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c0, csrg))
  srgcmn(c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csrg))
  srgmnd(c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)), wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c2, c5))
  srglmhm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c2, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)), c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
